ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Do you want to save the data ?')
MlsTrans('Do You want to close this windows ?')
MlsTrans('Please Enter either Debit or Credit Amount')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select * from cashbank_history_view where AcctKB=':1' and TrxDate=':2' and DC=':3' :4 order by Docnum

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('DocNumOBNK sebelum reset = '&IF(ISNULL({0,39}) OR Trim({0,39})='','Data Kosong',Trim({0,39}))&' ')
MlsTrans('DocNumOBNK setelah reset = '&IF(ISNULL({0,39}) OR Trim({0,39})='','Data Kosong',Trim({0,39}))&' ')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select * from cashbank_history_view where AcctKB=':1' and TrxDate=':2' and DC=':3' and BankAmt=:4 order by Docnum

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Nilai Credit = '&Str({11,26},'17')&' || Nilai Debit = '&Str({11,25},'17')&' || AcctCode = '&IF(ISNULL({11,2}),'KOSONG',Trim({11,2}))&' || DocNumOBNK = '&IF(ISNULL({0,10}),'KOSONG',Trim({0,10}))&' || DocNumCASHBANK = '&IF(ISNULL({0,6}),'KOSONG',Trim(Str({0,6},'15')))&' ')
